title: LF Jungle Main Gold5-Plat3
body:
There is an adelaide based league of legends discord server (private) that is growing in popularity relative to our (adelaide) scene, and my team is consistently making the grand final but we are looking for a new jungler to really bring us forward to win them instead of coming second place. team practise in flex is pretty erratic but we scrim other teams in the server majority of the team's average out to gold-plat and is a great team environment. People in Adelaide preferred and will be given higher priority when it comes to trials.

Add me on league "MPA Bill Cosby" and we'll talk more about it

replies.body: Good luck finding someone. :D ~Truth Gaming's support, if you remember me.
